AP Pro Football Writer DALLAS( AP)- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. over the CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page.
